message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe holds significant value for those looking for excellence in its category. Given its quality and the benefits it offers, I propose a special introductory price of $95 for you. This is an exclusive opportunity to experience the product at a discounted rate, considering its usual value. I trust this offer will allow you to make the most of its features and capabilities. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
